data.title: Utah Time Zone
data.meta_description: Current local time in Utah with information about official Utah time zones and daylight savings time..
data.text:
Current Local Time

Utah is officially in the Mountain Time Zone

The Current Time in

Utah is:

Wednesday

8/14/2024

5:31 AM

MDT

Utah

is in the

Mountain Time Zone

Time Zone

Abbreviations

Mountain Standard Time - is abbreviated as MST

Mountain Daylight Time - is abbreviated as MDT

UTC - GMT

Offset

Utah is GMT/UTC - 7h during Standard Time

Utah is GMT/UTC - 6h during Daylight Saving Time

Daylight Saving

Start Date

Utah starts Daylight Saving Time on

Sunday March 10, 2024 at 2:00 AM local time.
